text: Cheap beer but bunch of crackheads. Brought a sexy guy here and he felt out of place and wanted to leave within 5 minutes.
I enjoy the company there & the staff are so friendly .Its a cheap time out if your up to it .

As soon as you see the outside... the place speaks for itself. You can smell this place a mile away, and not in a good way. The crowd here is grimy, sleezy, dirty, and yes, smelly. I will not be coming back here.
